subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXCFWLOX
WHUS46 KLOX 112212
CFWLOX

COASTAL HAZARD MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
312 PM PDT WED APR 11 2007

..HIGH SURF TO CONTINUE ON SOUTHWEST FACING BEACHES OF SOUTHERN
CALIFORNIA...

STRONG WEST TO NORTHWEST FLOW OVER THE COASTAL WATERS WILL GENERATE
A SOMEWHAT LARGE WESTERLY SWELL. IN ADDITION...A MODERATE SOUTHERLY
SWELL FROM A PREVIOUS STORM IN THE SOUTHERN HEMISPHERE CONTINUES TO
IMPACT THE AREA. THIS COMBINATION OF WESTERLY AND SOUTHERLY SWELLS
WILL PRODUCE HIGH SURF ALONG THE EXPOSED SOUTHWEST FACING BEACHES OF
SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA THROUGH THURSDAY NIGHT.

CAZ040-041-120415-
/O.CON.KLOX.SU.Y.0006.000000T0000Z-070413T0600Z/
VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
312 PM PDT WED APR 11 2007

..HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THURSDAY...

A HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THURSDAY.

FIVE TO SEVEN FOOT BREAKERS ARE EXPECTED ALONG FAVORABLY EXPOSED
SOUTHWEST FACING BEACHES THROUGH THURSDAY NIGHT...WITH MAX SETS UP
TO EIGHT FEET POSSIBLE. SURF WILL PEAK EACH AFTERNOON AND EVENING...
AS FRESH WIND SWELL IS ADDED FROM GUSTY WINDS NEAR AND ALONG THE
SHORELINE. THE COMBINATION OF HIGH SURF AND MULTIPLE SWELL SOURCES
WILL ALSO PRODUCE DANGEROUS RIP CURRENTS ALONG THE BEACHES OF LOS
ANGELES AND VENTURA COUNTIES. THIS HIGH SURF WILL BEGIN TO SUBSIDE
THURSDAY NIGHT...THEN CONTINUE TO DIMINISH THROUGH THE WEEKEND.

$$

KITTELL
